The blackberry mojito was really good and so was the ceviche. The tempura shrimps were nice but the accompanying sauce was too sweet. The service was amazing. Do not miss out on the Muerte por Chocolate! Hands down the best dessert we had in Spain. *make reservations*pretty pricey (€70 for 2) *Try the Blackberry Mojito, Ceviche and Muerte por Chocolate!!
